meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels: 02274.9. The first digit (10,000s place) is blurry but inferred as '0' to fit the expected reading range of 2000-3000 m³. The red needle clearly points to the 0.05 mark. The 0.04 mark is at the 12 o'clock position (0 degrees), and the 0.05 mark is 36 degrees clockwise from it.
